title: Problem-Solving-Centered Education for Strengthening Human-Centered Security Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Computer Science and Programming Experience
context.additional_context: Security problem-solving scenarios through mathematical modeling, with team projects based on real-world cases.

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively analyze three or more solutions in real-world security scenarios.
Learners can select optimal security strategies under constraints that consider user requirements.
Learners can identify two or more vulnerabilities in security systems using mathematical modeling techniques.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
